scripts.s3Sync:dev-cdm: aws s3 sync build/ s3://prind-portal-dev --profile prind
scripts.s3Sync:staging-cdm: aws s3 sync build/ s3://prind-portal-staging --profile prind
scripts.s3Sync:production-cdm: aws s3 sync build/ s3://prind-portal --profile prind
scripts.s3Sync:dev-dhsf: aws s3 sync build/ s3://prind-portal-dhsf-dev --profile prind
scripts.s3Sync:staging-dhsf: aws s3 sync build/ s3://prind-portal-dhsf-staging --profile prind
scripts.s3Sync:production-dhsf: aws s3 sync build/ s3://prind-portal-dhsf --profile prind
scripts.deploy:dev-dhsf: npm run build:dev-dhsf && npm run s3Sync:dev-dhsf && npm run cfInvalidate:dev-dhsf
scripts.deploy:staging-dhsf: npm run build:staging-dhsf && npm run s3Sync:staging-dhsf && npm run cfInvalidate:staging-dhsf
scripts.deploy:production-dhsf: npm run build:production-dhsf && npm run s3Sync:production-dhsf && npm run cfInvalidate:production-dhsf
scripts.deploy:dev-cdm: npm run build:dev-cdm && npm run s3Sync:dev-cdm && npm run cfInvalidate:dev-cdm
scripts.deploy:staging-cdm: npm run build:staging-cdm && npm run s3Sync:staging-cdm && npm run cfInvalidate:staging-cdm
scripts.deploy:production-cdm: npm run build:production-cdm && npm run s3Sync:production-cdm && npm run cfInvalidate:production-cdm
scripts.deploy:all-dhsf: npm run deploy:dev-dhsf && npm run deploy:staging-dhsf && npm run deploy:production-dhsf
scripts.deploy:all-cdm: npm run deploy:dev-cdm && npm run deploy:staging-cdm && npm run deploy:production-cdm
scripts.deploy:all-dev: npm run deploy:dev-cdm && npm run deploy:dev-dhsf
scripts.deploy:all-staging: npm run deploy:staging-cdm && npm run deploy:staging-dhsf
scripts.deploy:all-production: npm run deploy:production-cdm && npm run deploy:production-dhsf
